description:
Since Natsumi`s mom can`t go to the beach with them, the frogs turn Natsumi into an adult to take them.  But there`s a catch: she has to enter into a bikini contest doing a comedy routine, and the frogs have her cracking terribly stupid jokes she finds embarrassing!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Crise de rires à la plage ! / Une histoire drôle
Natsumi Bakushou! Otona no Kaigan Monogatari de Arimasu
夏美 爆笑! オトナの海岸物語 であります
